title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8113.24 - Town of Poughkeepsie
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8113.24 - Town of Poughkeepsie

State Regulations
(a) Old

Post Road (a town road). The eastbound and westbound lanes of Old Post Road
from US Route 9 to Sheafe Road. (b) Sheafe Road (a town road). The northbound and southbound lanes of Sheafe Road
from Old Post Road to the Consolidated Freightways Terminal. (c) IBM Road (CR 48). The eastbound and
westbound roadways of IBM Road, CR 48, between US Route 9 and the Avis Drive
and Park terminal, a distance of 0.3+- mile. (d) -(e) [Repealed]
(f) Burnett Boulevard. Burnett Boulevard
between US Route 44 and Friendly Lane, a distance of 0.25+- mile in the Town of

Poughkeepsie. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8113.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
